content.rendered:
We’re a global, award-winning forex broker

The variety of awards we have received over the years is testament to our philosophy that success is all about providing unrivalled services to our clients. In addition, we take importance in creating a positive working environment for our people to grow & develop in.
2022 Awards

Best FX Introducing Broker Program Award
Jordan Financial Expo & Award 2022

Best Multi-Asset Broker
Forex Expo Dubai 2022

2021 Awards

Most Trusted Broker 2021
JFEX – Jordan

2018 Awards

Best Multi-Trading Platform
Global Brands Magazine

Best CSR Company
IFM – International Finance Magazine

‘Best Forex Customer Service Provider!’  
International Business Magazine  

Best Forex Broker 
IFF – Malaysia

Most Transparent Forex Brokers 
Jordan

Best Forex Research Team 
Cyprus
